posts.postText:
STEAM_0:0:37562367

Consistently teamkilled with knife
Killed all prisoners if he wasn't given a knife
Killed me whenever he saw me just because he didn't like me

I have a video in which he tries to get a knife, kills me randomly, and 4 other people say that they want him banned. Also some screenshots of him freekilling.

 http://video.xfire.com/44bf9b-4.jpg  

 http://img38.imageshack.us/img38/395/bajailhellzprisonbeta40.jpg 

 http://img864.imageshack.us/img864/395/bajailhellzprisonbeta40.jpg 

 http://img690.imageshack.us/img690/395/bajailhellzprisonbeta40.jpg 

Aside from all the rulebreaking he was also a general asshole, goading people, forcing the other guards to obey him (usually by stabbing them if they don't), and abusing his power.

Oh, and I finish with a quote from him: "Oh yeah bitches 101 points, suck this giant dick"
Uh Quack, did you ban him on Jail or just EasyBans? EB isn't connected with Jail.
